definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces

sentences.english: The nuns live in a cloister of calm.
sentences.chinese: 修女们住在一个幽静的修道院里。

sentences.english: The town was quiet but remote, they felt very happ though.
sentences.chinese: 小城幽静而偏僻，他们感觉却很幸福。

sentences.english: The ocean will make your open-minded, the Lao mountain then lets you realize pure falsely with secluded .
sentences.chinese: 大海会使你的心胸开阔，崂山则让你体会清虚与幽静。

sentences.english: Describe the secluded landscape in evening cent of deer firewood.
sentences.chinese: 描写鹿柴傍晚时分的幽静景色。

sentences.english: He makes a resting-place for me in the green fields: he is my guide by the quiet waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我卧在青绿的草场，又领我走进幽静的水旁。

sentences.english: He turned into the quiet corner in Soho .
sentences.chinese: 他转进苏合的幽静的角落里。

sentences.english: The dining environment is first-rate, very appropriate for urbanites .
sentences.chinese: 典雅而幽静的就餐空间，非常适合都市人。

sentences.english: Quiet northern part of trees, flowers.
sentences.chinese: 北部树木幽静，鸟语花香。

sentences.english: The Lao Dianying Tea Garden is set in a quiet, lush courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 老电影茶楼设在一个幽静而绿意盎然的院子里。

sentences.english: The cloisters still retain something of the quiet and seclusion of former days.
sentences.chinese: 回廊一带依然保留有几分当年的幽静出世之慨。

sentences.english: The quiet home life and peaceful happiness of Bleak Hills passed before his imagination.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中浮现出童山的幽静生活和安逸的家庭幸福。

sentences.english: In the quiet immortal mountain, my heart is pure & quiet & peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 在仙家山幽静的怀抱里，我感到内心的纯静和安宁。

sentences.english: It was a quiet location far from the highway bypass.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子地处幽静之处，远离公路支路。

sentences.english: The gamin loves the city, he also loves solitude, since he has something of the sage in him.
sentences.chinese: 英文野孩爱城市，也爱幽静，他多少有些逸兴闲情。

sentences.english: They sit close together in the sequestered pergola.
sentences.chinese: 他们在幽静的藤架下拥坐在一起。

sentences.english: Faintly visible for you for thousands of years ago under the cherry grove, quiet and deep.
sentences.chinese: 依稀可见千年前为你种下的那片樱花林，幽静深远。

definition: (of a location) quiet and secluded/beautiful and secluded
serene and elegant (of a place)/ethereal (of music)
serene and hidden in depth or distance
verdant/lush green and full of life
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
